products.name: Carnitas Mexican Taco
products.description: 4-inch nixtamalized corn flour tortilla, pot-braised pork, yellow onion, cilantro and lime. This product cannot be modified and is served at room temperature.

products.name: Pork Burrito
products.description: 12" wheat tortilla, cheese, beans, tomato rice, pulled pork, pico de gallo, lettuce, sour cream, and spicy sauce (we recommend Chipotle Sauce). This dish is served at room temperature

products.name: Chorizo Mexican Taco
products.description: 4-inch tortilla made from nixtamalized corn flour, homemade chorizo, yellow onion, cilantro, and lime. This product cannot be modified and is served at room temperature.

products.name: Mexican Taco Combo
products.description: Three 4-inch nixtamalized corn flour tortillas with oven-braised beef, pot-braised pork, and homemade chorizo, yellow onion, cilantro, and lime. This product cannot be modified and is served at room temperature.

products.name: Chicken Quesadilla
products.description: 10" wheat tortilla, cheese, grilled chicken, pico de gallo, sour cream, and spicy sauce (we recommend Verde Sauce) This dish is served at room temperature

products.name: Chicken Mexican Taco
products.description: 4-inch nixtamalized corn flour tortilla, grilled chicken, yellow onion, cilantro, and lime. This product cannot be modified and is served at room temperature.
